comment: Great professor. Not an easy A, you do have to work for it. Final is a 2500 word paper that you work on throughout the entire semester. After your first grade, you can revise it and he will average the 2 for your final grade. I hate english but made an A.

great professor knows his stuff, and will assist you outside class if you have a problem. take note of everything he says on the poems and stories .. attendance is mandatory only 3 misses allowed so use them wisely. 2 tests a midterm and a final plus a bunch of papers. take him

Martin was easy to work with, and I learned a lot about how to construct a paper.  I would take him again, he does grade everything though.  So even on the things that seem stupid still try.  Also, he spells out exactly what he wants from you and is very good at communicating.
Professor Martin is an amazing professor and he makes the class enjoyable with his humor and wit. This class was a pretty easy A and it significantly helped me with my future writing. Great class!
He is an absolutely amazing teacher. Very knowledgable in the subject and passionate about what he does. One of the best english teachers I've ever had.

Mr.Martin was easily the best English teacher I have ever had. He grades extremely fair and if you did not receive the grade you wanted, he allows you to redo for some credit back. He makes the class fun and extremely entertaining. You will not want to miss his class! Take him for sure!!
Great, easy going guy! He sends out email reminders and has students engage in class. I met the most fiends in his class because of the interaction in class. I'm even taking him again for 1102!!
Brilliant, amazing professor. That is all.

Hands down the best teacher I've ever had at any level of education. He communicates with the class and keeps the class up to date on what assignments are going to due. He lets us know what's expected of us to be successful of the quizzes. He lets the class have writing workshops to help critique your Rough Drafts ... What more could you ask for?!

Very good teacher! He's very straight forward with assignments and has no problem helping you if you need help. A lot of pointless reading from the textbook it's not too bad. Loved him and I would totally recommend people taking his class!

Love this guy! I had him for English 1102!Show up to class, do every assignment and when he tells you to read, read. There may be a quiz. He knows what he is talking about and always tends to make class interesting! Very knowledgeable. Show up to all draft workshops. I was a point away form making an a because of that :( My fault though

Dr. Martin is a great professor. He assigns four essays and helps each student with the topics for those essays. There is some textbook reading from time to time, but it is short. He occasionally gives fairly easy quizzes over the reading. Professor Martin truly knows what he is teaching, and he has a great sense of humor. I highly recommend him.

My favorite teacher of my first semester. He tells you what is expected for every class via email and the class before. You do have to read that book from time to time but he makes the class really fun and he is really funny

Professor Martin is absolutely wonderful. He obviously loves his job because he is very helpful, understanding, and HILARIOUS. He will always send out emails of what is expected for the next class. You use the textbook occasionally to prepare for super easy quizzes. Make sure you go to class because you do a lot of peer workshops. TAKE HIM!! :)

By far the best professor of my first semester. If I could get him next semester, then I would. He is not very strict on grading, nor is he a boring teacher. I came out with what felt like an easy A in his class. I absolutely love Seth.

Awesome teacher, goes out of his way to involve the class, and or peek the classes interest, with discussions and such. He assigns six essays, which he also allows for revision. Does short quizzes over readings from the book, and the final grade is a portfolio of sorts from works already completed. Attendance is mandatory!

Mr. Martin is the best. You have no tests or final, only essays, quizzes over the readings in the book, and a daily grade for coming to class. For all of your essays you pick your own topics and can make them personal and he will help you in determining what each person should write.  He is funny and really gets to know all his students. TAKE HIM!
